Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vector2

  • public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object
    The Vector2 class provides an object to represent 2 dimensional vector quantity and changes to aspects of the object.
    Version:
    %I% %G%
    Author:
    Robert James Meade

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private double y
      y component of the vector

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      double getAngle()
      The getAngle method gets the angle, or direction, of the vector.

      The getMagnitude method gets the magnitude of the vector

      • Vector2

        public Vector2(double magnitude,
               double angle,
               boolean isVector)
        3-Argument Vector2 Constructor
        Parameters:
        magnitude - magnitude of vector
        angle - direction of vector as an angle from -pi to +pi
        isVector - are the 2 doubles passed in a vector and not components?
